description:
The iconic lofoten Gore-Tex Pro Pants are a highly durable and protective freeride pants made to deliver premium powder functionality. These freeride classics have a regular, practical fit and are made in 200D recycled GORE-TEX® PRO most rugged fabric to ensure optimal durability and weather protection. The pants have two thigh cargo pockets with easy access, a zippered back pocket, and a small coin pocket. The ¾ length thigh ventilation with two-way zippers secure great ventilation and they have extremely durable reinforcement on the lower leg to protect the pants from steel edges.

Norrona optimized the waistline to prevent when attaching the pants to a bib or vest. By having the front zip slightly facing the side, they’ve created a small overlap that will provide a full seal. Other features include integrated snow gaiters, articulated legs, snap button tightening around the ankles and lower leg Velcro reinforcements to protect against steel edges. The pants are compatible with all their ski bibs and the snap-in powder skirt on their jackets. They’ve passed the Gore-Tex Storm+ Test.
name: Norrona Lofoten GTX Pro Pants - Mens
